name: Deeply Dazed
description:
This is a procedurally-generated puzzle game. Try to match the pattern by changing each hole's radius and angular speed. 

Control: 

Click on the hole to focus;

Drag the multipliers to the left to change radius and speed;

use slider to control max speed;

If you don't like the current pattern, you can generate a new one by pressing "R" or the reset button in pause menu.
